content.html: Southwest has canceled another 2,500 flights so far on Tuesday. People now find themselves stranded at airports across the country, with little idea of when they can get home or where their bags are. n.pr/3WHka3b
content.value:
Southwest has canceled another 2,500 flights so far on Tuesday.

People now find themselves stranded at airports across the country, with little idea of when they can get home or where their bags are.
n.pr/3WHka3b

content.html:
.@SouthwestAir took $3.7B in federal aid from 2020-21. It’s CEO got a pay raise to a $9.1M package in 2022. Yet Southwest employees are working 16 hour shifts & threatened w/termination if they refuse overtime or call in sick. Socialism for the wealthy. Capitalism for workers.
twitter.com/npr/status/160…
content.value:
.@SouthwestAir took $3.7B in federal aid from 2020-21.

It’s CEO got a pay raise to a $9.1M package in 2022.

Yet Southwest employees are working 16 hour shifts & threatened w/termination if they refuse overtime or call in sick.

Socialism for the wealthy. Capitalism for workers.
